content:
Check:
  any:
    - name: --BLFL
      operator: empty
    - name: --BLFL
      operator: equal_to
      value: Y
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SEND.147
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when --BLFL value is not populated with either "Y" or
  null
Outcome:
  Message: --BLFL value must either be "Y" or null
Rule Type: Record Data
Scopes: {}
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: v3.0
        References:
          - Origin: SEND Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: SEND147
              Version: '1'
            Version: '4.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: A baseline indicator may be used to calculate differences
                  or changes from baseline. Value should be Y or null. The baseline
                  flag is sponsor-defined.
                Document: SENDIG v3.0
                Section: 6.3.1 Body Weight - BW, Variable Name BWBLFL, CDISC Notes
              - Cited Guidance: A baseline indicator may be used to calculate differences
                  or changes from baseline. Value should be Y or null. The baseline
                  flag is sponsor-defined.
                Document: SENDIG v3.1
                Section: 6.3.1 Body Weight - BW, Variable Name BWBLFL, CDISC Notes
              - Cited Guidance: A baseline indicator may be used to calculate differences
                  or changes from baseline. Value should be Y or null. The baseline
                  flag is sponsor-defined.
                Document: SENDIG v3.1.1
                Section: 6.3.1 Body Weight - BW, Variable Name BWBLFL, CDISC Notes
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SEND Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:

                  or changes from baseline. Value should be Y or null. The baseline
                  flag is sponsor-defined.
                Document: SENDIG v3.1
                Section: 6.3.1 Body Weight - BW, Variable Name BWBLFL, CDISC Notes
              - Cited Guidance: A baseline indicator may be used to calculate differences
                  or changes from baseline. Value should be Y or null. The baseline
                  flag is sponsor-defined.
                Document: SENDIG v3.1.1
                Section: 6.3.1 Body Weight - BW, Variable Name BWBLFL, CDISC Notes
      - Name: SENDIG

                  or changes from baseline. Value should be Y or null. The baseline

                Document: SENDIG v3.0
                Section: 6.3.1 Body Weight - BW, Variable Name BWBLFL, CDISC Notes
              - Cited Guidance: A baseline indicator may be used to calculate differences

                  flag is sponsor-defined.
                Document: SENDIG v3.1
                Section: 6.3.1 Body Weight - BW, Variable Name BWBLFL, CDISC Notes
              - Cited Guidance: A baseline indicator may be used to calculate differences
